attributes.additional_details: Because pedophiles are the worst kind of criminal on the planet and the families and victims of the crimes are not being justified at all by the pathetic sentences the judges are handing out to people who are abusing innocent children
attributes.background: pedophiles to be locked away for a long long time including this who have images of children receiving abuse

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Longer sentences for child sex offenders, sex offenders and rapists: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323338

Mandatory life sentences for child sexual abuse: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304563

Increase minimum and maximum sentences for all crimes against children: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/467154
